```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
```


```{r table}
system_bd <- dplyr::tibble(
  System = c("Document Management", "e-learning"),
  "2021" = c(5700000+(254250*3*1.3), 405790*1.3),
  "2022" = c(254250*12*1.3, 1623160),
)
library(gt)
system_bd %>% 
  gt() %>%
  fmt_currency(
    columns = c("2021","2022"),
    currency =  "JPY"
  ) %>%
  summary_rows(
    columns = c("2021","2022"),
    fns = list(
      total = ~sum(.)),
    formatter = fmt_currency,
    currency = "JPY")%>%
  tab_header(
    title = "2021年、2022年のシステム関連予算"
  )%>%
  tab_footnote(
    footnote = c("10月~12月までの3ヶ月間"),
    locations = cells_column_labels(columns = "2021")
    ) %>%
  tab_options(table.width = 600, 
              column_labels.background.color ="#E8F6EF")

```
